title: Sheriff but it gives detection immunity

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target would **not** show as "not suspicious" to Sheriff (948), give them detection immunity.
- You gain the results that a Sheriff (948) would receive.
- Your first attribute resolves before your second.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose. Or just the Sheriff. Fuck the Sheriff.
